pages.text: $(o)"The God from-and-to-Nothingness is both the first and the last hour of the day, the hour 0 or 24. He was born out of Nowhere, and this is exactly where he returns [returned?]."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with the $(l:alchemy/entry_flesh_lamb)Flesh of the Lamb$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().
